entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Malbaie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:13 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
